body:
i installed bitcoin core 0.16.3, and full sync, i load my keys, and wait, and rescan
now balances are diffrent shown, any suggestion what is correct balance
some command i apply, and results here
waiting your help, solutions etc
Thankx

~/bitcoin-0.16.3/bin$ ./bitcoin-cli getwalletinfo
{

---------------------------------------------------------------

title: Correct balance ?
